Package io.github.cjstehno.ersatz.util

Interface Timeout

public interface Timeout
A utility for operation timeout support.

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static boolean
    isTrueBefore(Supplier<Boolean> condition, long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
    Used to wrap a blocking timeout around the provided condition.

  • Method Details

    • isTrueBefore

      static boolean isTrueBefore(Supplier<Boolean> condition, long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Used to wrap a blocking timeout around the provided condition. If it is not met (resolves true) before the timeout expires, a value of false will be returned.
      Parameters:
      condition - the boolean condition waiting to be resolved as true
      timeout - the timeout time value
      unit - the timeout units
      Returns:
      a value of true if the condition was met before the timeout expired
